description: The Tupolev Tu-4 is a strategic nuclear bomber. It is a reverse-engineered version of the Boeing B-29A. The NATO reporting name is Bull.
variantnotes: Defensive Tail Guns. Equipped with two 23 mm NS-23 cannon in a tail mount. They can fire at targets in the 60- arc. They may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. The roll to hit is 3/2/2 and the AtA rating is 4. Ammunition is 11.0.
loadnotes: Station 1 is the internal bomb bay. It can carry either (a) one RDS-1 nuclear bomb (weight 10,000), (b) one RDS-3 nuclear bomb (weight 8000, or (c) one RDS-5 nuclear bomb (weight unknown).
Station 2 is the rear internal bomb bay and can carry two 640 gal FTs (each 2400L, weight 5,000, and 220 fuel points).
Exceptionally, internal fuel also contributes 1 load point per 50 fuel points. A return mission will typically require leaving the target with at least 750 fuel points (15 load points).
